meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which hair is braided close to the scalp in rows.
meanings.sent1: She wore beautiful cornbraids to the party.
meanings.sent2: Her cornbraids looked neat and stylish.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled as she tried to count the cornbraids in her friend's hair.
meanings.sent4: The cornbraids resembled rows of neatly planted crops on her head.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cornbraids made her hair look like a work of art.

meanings.definition: To braid hair in a specific style known as cornbraids.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to cornbraid her hair from a tutorial.
meanings.sent2: I cornbraid my hair when I want a neat look.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could cornbraid his dog's fur if it was long enough.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved swiftly as she cornbraided her hair.
meanings.sent5: Watching her cornbraid was like witnessing a skilled craftsman at work.
